item.title: 比利时工人就布鲁塞尔奥迪车队受到威胁举行游行以示同情
item.description: 周一，5000 多人在布鲁塞尔游行，比利时首都大部分公共交通暂停，声援工作受到威胁的布鲁塞尔奥迪公司工人。【原文：More than 5,000 people marched through Brussels and most public transport in the Belgian capital was suspended on Monday in solidarity with workers of Audi Brussels whose jobs are threatened.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司称波音将为退出合作谈判支付 1.5 亿美元
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周一表示，波音公司将就其退出 2020 年商业航空合作谈判的决定向巴西航空工业公司支付总额 1.5 亿美元的赔偿金。【原文：Boeing will pay Embraer a gross amount of $150 million over its decision to walk away from talks for a commercial aviation tie-up in 2020, the Brazilian planemaker said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲不急于放松反垄断立场
item.description: 马里奥-德拉吉（Mario Draghi）上周呼吁修改欧洲严格的促进竞争政策规则，这引发了许多猜测，即欧盟下一任反垄断主管可能会对兼并采取较宽松的态度，从而产生欧洲工业 "冠军"。【原文：Mario Draghi's call last week for a revamp of Europe's tough pro-competition policy rules prompted much speculation that the EU's next antitrust chief may take a lighter-touch approach to mergers that could yield European industrial "champions".】

item.title: 花旗集团以 8000 万美元向 JTC 出售信托服务部门
item.description: 专业服务提供商 JTC 周一表示，已同意以 8000 万美元的价格收购花旗集团的全球信托和信托管理服务业务。【原文：Professional services provider JTC said on Monday it has agreed to buy Citigroup's global fiduciary and trust administration services business for $80 million.】

item.title: Chipotle 增加自动化程度，"自动鳄梨 "机器人帮助制作鳄梨酱
item.description: Chipotle 将自动碗和沙拉制造机以及牛油果加工机器人搬出了试验厨房，并搬进了加利福尼亚州的几家分店。【原文：Chipotle moved an automated bowl-and-salad maker and an avocado-processing robot out of its test kitchen and into a couple of locations in California.】

item.title: 美联储在即，外资 8 月向新兴市场投资组合注入 310 亿美元 -IIF
item.description: 一家银行贸易集团周一提供的数据显示，由于市场继续为美国联邦储备委员会即将降息做准备，8月份外国投资者向新兴市场股票和债务投资组合净投入了309亿美元。【原文：Foreign investors ploughed a net $30.9 billion into emerging market stocks and debt portfolios in August as markets continue to position for an imminent rate cut from the U.S. Federal Reserve, data from a banking trade group showed on Monday.】

item.title: 德国商业银行拒绝了联合信贷银行的收购请求
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank）首席执行官周一拒绝了意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）的收购请求，称他对该银行有自己的计划，希望它能保持独立。【原文：The chief executive of Germany's Commerzbank snubbed overtures for a takeover by Italy's UniCredit , saying on Monday he had his own plans for the bank and hoped it could stay independent.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称法国农业信贷银行选择碳交易而非黄金
item.description: 法国第二大上市银行法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole）的三位知情人士告诉路透社，该行已决定从 2025 年起，以受监管的碳市场交易取代贵金属交易。【原文：France's second largest listed bank Credit Agricole has decided to replace precious metals with trading in the regulated carbon markets starting from 2025, three sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 央行机构国际清算银行敦促各国央行不要浪费利率缓冲区
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）敦促各国央行不要浪费它们在过去几年中重建的利率缓冲区，而现在又过快地削减利率。【原文：The Bank for International Settlements has urged top central banks not to squander the interest rate buffers they have rebuilt over the last couple of years by now cutting them again too rapidly.】

item.title: 美联储会议周谨慎开幕
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货持平至小幅上涨，因为在美联储本周晚些时候做出关键性货币政策决定之前，投资者普遍持谨慎态度，认为借贷成本将大幅下降。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were flat to slightly higher on Monday as caution prevailed ahead of a pivotal monetary policy decision by the Federal Reserve later in the week, with investors pricing in a steep reduction in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 泰坦尼克号建造商哈兰与沃尔夫公司将关闭非核心业务
item.description: 哈兰德-沃尔夫公司（Harland & Wolff）周一表示，随着这家英国造船商在财务困境中努力维持经营，它将关闭非核心业务并裁减部分员工。【原文：Harland & Wolff said on Monday it will wind down its non-core businesses and lay off some of its employees as the British shipbuilder struggles to stay in business amid financial woes.】

item.title: 最高法院新任期临近，美国监管权力面临新考验
item.description: 美国最高法院在做出其他重大裁决后，有机会进一步削弱联邦监管机构的权威。【原文：A case involving the vape industry gives the U.S. Supreme Court a chance to further erode the authority of federal regulatory agencies following other major rulings as the justices gird for a new term featuring important business-related questions.】

item.title: 目标公司将为假日季招聘 10 万名季节性工人
item.description: 塔吉特周一表示，该公司将招聘约 10 万名季节性员工，与过去三年的招聘数量持平，因为该零售商正在为重要的节假日做准备。【原文：Target said on Monday that it would hire about 100,000 seasonal employees, in-line with what it had hired for the last three years, as the retailer gears up for its all-important holiday period.】

item.title: 尽管提前三次降息，加拿大人仍感受到经济的痛苦
item.description: 尽管自 6 月份以来已三次降息，但加拿大消费者似乎仍比他们的邻居美国消费者感到压力更大，因为美联储尚未开始降低借贷成本。【原文：Despite three interest rate cuts since June, Canadian consumers still appear to be feeling more stressed than their neighbors in the U.S., where the Federal Reserve has yet to start any reductions in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 拉斯维加斯发生的一切表明美联储的 "软着陆 "是个不错的赌注
item.description: 当美国经济下滑时，拉斯维加斯和整个内华达州劳动力市场的裂缝通常会提前出现并迅速扩大，这使得这个消费驱动型城市和内华达州成为美国其他地区的风向标。【原文：The cracks in the labor market in Las Vegas and across Nevada have typically appeared early and widened fast when the U.S. economy soured, making the consumer-driven city and state a bellwether of sorts for the rest of the country.】

item.title: 低气价和液化天然气需求成为 Gastech 会议的焦点
item.description: 由于液化天然气（LNG）出口的蓬勃发展有助于欧洲摆脱俄罗斯天然气的依赖，同时亚洲也在逐渐远离煤炭，因此美国市场将成为焦点。【原文：Top energy executives and ministers will meet in Houston this week for the annual Gastech conference, with U.S. markets in focus as booming liquefied natural gas (LNG) exports help wean Europe off Russian gas and as Asia moves away from coal.】

item.title: 独家：英特尔如何失去索尼 PlayStation 业务
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，英特尔失去了 2022 年设计和制造索尼 PlayStation 6 芯片的合同，这对其建立新生合同制造业务的努力造成了重大打击。【原文：Intel lost out on a contract to design and fabricate Sony’s PlayStation 6 chip in 2022, which dealt a significant blow to its effort to build its fledgling contract manufacturing business, according to three sources with knowledge of the events.】

item.title: 早间新闻美联储进入宽松周，中国经济疲软
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: TikTok 与美国司法部就潜在的美国禁令对簿公堂
item.description: TikTok 和母公司 ByteDance 的律师将于周一在华盛顿的一个法庭上与司法部就一项法律的命运展开交锋。【原文：Lawyers for TikTok and parent company ByteDance will square off with the Justice Department in a Washington courtroom on Monday over the fate of a law that could ban the short video app used by 170 million Americans as soon as Jan. 19.】

item.title: 波音罢工：老板们遍体鳞伤、一筹莫展、危机四伏
item.description: 波音公司的老板们正面临困境。【原文：Boeing bosses are staring down the barrel.】

item.title: 默多克继任大戏在不公开法庭上演
item.description: 鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）的全球电视和出版帝国控制权争夺战周一在内华达州里诺市的一间法庭开庭，法官将在法庭上审理有争议的继承权问题。【原文：A battle over control of Rupert Murdoch’s global television and publishing empire begins Monday in a Reno, Nevada courtroom, where a judge will consider the contentious matter of succession.】

item.title: 8 月亚洲债券因美联储宽松政策预期而吸引大量资金流入
item.description: 由于对美国联邦储备委员会将在 9 月份开始放宽利率持乐观态度，亚洲债券在 8 月份连续第四个月吸引了外资流入。【原文：Asian bonds attracted foreign inflows for a fourth successive month in August on optimism that the U.S. Federal Reserve will start easing interest rates in September.】

item.title: 意大利 Marcolin 公司将从 2025 年起生产和分销 Abercrombie & Fitch 眼镜
item.description: 意大利眼镜制造商 Marcolin 与美国时尚零售商 Abercrombie & Fitch 周一发表联合声明称，双方签署了一项多年期独家授权协议，Marcolin 将为该零售商生产和分销太阳镜和光学镜架。【原文：Italian eyewear maker Marcolin signed an exclusive multi-year licensing agreement with Abercrombie & Fitch to produce and distribute sunglasses and optical frames for the US fashion retailer, the two companies said in a joint statement on Monday.】

item.title: Trafigura 任命 Jiri Zrust 为运营资产部全球主管
item.description: 全球商品贸易公司 Trafigura 宣布将任命 Jiri Zrust 担任新设立的全球运营资产主管一职。【原文：Global commodity trading house Trafigura has announced it will appoint Jiri Zrust to the newly opened role of Global Head of Operational Assets.】

item.title: 波音罢工进入第四天，新谈判迫在眉睫
item.description: 周一，在美国西海岸工厂制造飞机的 3 万多名波音公司工人的罢工已持续到第四天，公司和工会谈判代表将于周二恢复劳资合同谈判。【原文：A strike by more than 30,000 Boeing workers who build planes in factories on the U.S. west coast stretched into its fourth day on Monday, with company and union negotiators due to resume talks over a labor contract on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿波罗与英国石油公司达成 10 亿美元协议，为跨亚得里亚海天然气管道股份提供资金
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）周一表示，该公司已与英国能源巨头英国石油公司（BP）签署了一项价值 10 亿美元的协议，为其在跨亚得里亚海天然气管道中的股份提供资金。【原文：Apollo Global Management has signed a $1 billion deal with British energy major BP to fund its stake in the Trans Adriatic natural gas pipeline, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 对冲基金转向购买银行、保险和贸易公司，高盛集团称
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一份报告显示，银行、保险和贸易公司重获青睐，对冲基金上周以 2023 年 6 月以来最快的速度抢购这些公司的股票。【原文：Banks, insurance and trading firms returned to favour as hedge funds last week snapped up these company stocks at the fastest pace since June 2023, a Goldman Sachs note showed.】

item.title: 泰国官员称，预计将有不到 4000 万人参加施舍计划
item.description: 泰国财政部官员周一表示，泰国预计将有不到4000万人报名参加其旗舰数字钱包发放计划，第一阶段将从9月25日开始向1450万弱势人群发放。【原文：Thailand expects less than 40 million people to sign up for its flagship digital wallet handout scheme, with the first phase set to be distributed to 14.5 million vulnerable people from Sept. 25, a finance ministry official said on Monday.】

item.title: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）称大众汽车可能因削减产能而计提 30-40 亿欧元准备金
item.description: 券商杰富瑞（Jefferies）在与大众汽车管理层座谈后发表的一份报告中写道，大众汽车最早可能在第四季度为削减产能计划计提数十亿欧元的准备金。【原文：Volkswagen may book billions of euros in provisions for planned capacity cuts as early as the fourth quarter, brokerage Jefferies wrote in a note after accompanying the carmaker's management.】

item.title: 意大利私人银行 Banca Generali 竞购经纪人 Intermonte
item.description: 意大利私人银行通用银行（Banca Generali）周一表示，将以 9800 万欧元（1.09 亿美元）全现金收购 Intermonte，将这家米兰经纪商私有化，并将其服务直接提供给通用银行的客户。【原文：Italian private bank Banca Generali on Monday said it was launching a 98 million euro ($109 mln) all-cash buyout bid for Intermonte , to take the Milanese broker private and direct its services at Banca Generali clients.】
